offerLetter.title: Job Offer Letter
offerLetter.template:
Dear {employeeName},

We are pleased to offer you the position of {position} at {companyName}. Your start date will be {startDate}, and you will be reporting to {managerName}.

Your annual salary will be ${salary}, paid on a {payFrequency} basis. You will also be eligible for our benefits package, including health insurance, 401(k), and paid time off.

We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

Best regards,
{hrManagerName}
HR Manager

promotionLetter.title: Promotion Letter
promotionLetter.template:
Dear {employeeName},

Congratulations! We are delighted to inform you of your promotion to the position of {newPosition}, effective {effectiveDate}.

Your new annual salary will be ${newSalary}. This promotion recognizes your hard work and dedication to {companyName}.

We look forward to your continued success in your new role.

Best regards,
{hrManagerName}
HR Manager

terminationLetter.title: Termination Letter
terminationLetter.template:
Dear {employeeName},

This letter is to inform you that your employment with {companyName} will be terminated effective {terminationDate}.

The reason for this termination is {terminationReason}.

Please return all company property to the HR department by your last day of work. Your final paycheck will be processed on {finalPayDate}.

If you have any questions, please contact the HR department.

Sincerely,
{hrManagerName}
HR Manager
